attributes.action: Force supermarkets to remove mother & child parking bays
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: These parking bays are a nuisance and un-necessary. The supermarkets should just make all bays wider. Children can walk, and for many years mothers with baby buggies have managed without the need to be 'closer' to the store. They are a ridiculous sweetener by the supermarkets. Whats more, after around 6pm at night most of the bays are empty as the children are in bed.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
